content: indigo gateway by janet avila we chose indigo dyed yarn from mitchell wool for this year s yarn crawl project because it is oh so soft and naturally dyed mitchell wool co is a regenerative family farm in michigan supporting the us wool industry with sustainable plant-dyed yarns the indigo chakra is considered to be the gateway to wisdom and higher consciousness my hope is that your project will bring abbreviations c4f cable 4 front slip 2 stitches onto cable more of that into the world needle hold in front of work k2 from left needle then k2 from cable needle tutorials k knit click on the qr code to watch the videos on how k2tog knit 2 stitches together decrease 1 stitch to cable without a cable needle and my tips for kfb knit into front and back of stitch increase 1 st making tassels p purl rs right side ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise knit them together through the back loop decrease 1 st st s stitch es ws wrong side yo yarn over pattern instructions pattern information set up 3 cable panels 12 sts finished size cast on 12 stitches 8 at widest point x 64 after blocking row 1 rs k all stitches yarn row 2 ws p all stitches 2 skeins of mitchell dk 150 yards each row 3 rs k all stitches needles & notions row 4 ws p all stitches us 9 needles straight or circular row 5 rs - cable row c4f 3 times gauge row 6-13 repeat row 2-5 twice more approximately 6sts = 1 measured across the first twelve row 14 ws p all stitches 12 sts stitch cable section indigo gateway - stringtheoryyarncompany com pattern instructions continued row 6 ws p4 k6 twice p4 increasing row 7 rs k4 p6 k1 ssk yo k1 p6 k4 row 8 ws p4 k6 twice p4 1 lace & 3 cable panels 12-16 sts row 1 rs - 4 once row 5 rs - increase row k3 kfb p1 k1 yo k2tog repeat row 1 - 2 once more kfb p1 k4 16 sts row 6 ws p4 k2 twice p4 3 lace & 5 cable panels 24-28 sts row 7 rs k4 p2 k1 ssk yo k1 p2 k4 row 1 rs- no increase k4 p1 k1 yo k2tog k1 p1 3 row 8 ws p4 k2 twice p4 times k4 24 sts row 2 ws p4 k1 4 times p4 row 1 rs c4f p2 twice c4f row 3 rs k4 p1 k1 ssk yo
